title: How Odors Influence Brainâ€™s Decision Making Mechanism
excerpt: Researchers have uncovered a novel function of the hippocampus in decision making, showing that specific brain cells, known as 'time cells,' are stimulated by odors to facilitate rapid 'go, no-go' decisions.

title: What is the secret to an evocative smell description?
excerpt: Many languages have very few odour-related words, so conveying what a scent is like requires knowing your audience
